rdf:Property.rdfs:label: falls within
содержится в
περιέχεται σε
s’insère dans
fällt in
está contido em
时间上被涵盖於
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property describes the inclusion relationship between two instances of E52 Time-Span. This property supports the notion that a Time-Span’s temporal extent falls within the temporal extent of another Time-Span. It addresses temporal containment only, and no contextual link between the two instances of Time-Span is implied.
